description: When adventure calls, these shorts will go anywhere. Lightweight, comfortable and durable, the zipped pockets will secure your phone until you’ve reached the day’s objective, whilst the matching belt leaves nothing to chance. This high performance fabric uses recycled polyester made from recycled Pet bottles. Polyester sheds weight and adds durability, elastane increases mobility and merino ensures it retains performance of merino wool.
name: Mons Royale Nomad Shorts - Mens
